text_block_list.text: One day, when I stopped by the riverbank…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Heh. Are you here to enjoy the sunset, too?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: No, I'm not. I'm here to swear.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …A vow?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh, the sun is about to set.

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Right now, she's very anxious. What will happen to the world after losing its brilliance?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: That's why I wanted you to be able to relax. With my oath as the future 'end of the century'.

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Come on, Sun. Rest in peace. I'll continue lighting the world for you.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (Haaaaah?!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (The Hegemon?! There's no way she'd swear on the sun! That can't be…!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (Isn't she too cool?!)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Y-Yeah… I swear to the sun, too, right?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh? Is that vow more grand than the founding of the undefeated king, the Temple of Operaau?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …The temple!? Y-You're right! I mean, I…!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Be a good girl who can't lose no matter how far away she is! With the highest GI record, everyone's guts are blown!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Become a legend with the greatest sparkle of all! And a huge vodka statue!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm going to make history as bright as the sun!!

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: ………Eckserend!!

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Vodka, your goal is noble… cool! Just as elegant as mine!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Heh, heheh♪ W-Well? Like that? Maybe?

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hey, you. Do you still have time? Want to go tell her more about our vows?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Heh.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Opera Au! Of course!
The two of them start running. Beyond the riverbank, beyond the sun――!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Huh? What are those two doing here?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I came all this way to train on my own, but I can't concentrate at all!
